Module bestSokobanEverV6
Package model

Class GameLevelHandler

java.lang.Object
model.GameLevelHandler
public class GameLevelHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Helps a GameModel object to handle data related to GameLevel
Author:
Shuxiang Hu
